attributes.action: Charges for re-take Driving Test to be reduced
attributes.additional_details:
PETITION FOCUS :- NO CHARGE FOR RE-SIT TEST WHEN FAULT OF OTHERS, REDUCED CHARGE FOR OTHER RE-SITS

Cost of test is £60 plus lesson before & hiring the car for the test hour.

Students with part-time jobs find it very difficult to fund everything and save for Uni.

It would help youngsters and society in general if driving re-tests were reduced or free. This means people could afford their re-test which would help reduce the number of unlicensed drivers on the road.

There should be a scale of reduced charges depending on fail reasons, not your fault = no charge - we need to help our youngsters, not charge them even more.
